Title: A Long Way from Home
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (creator), Etan Frankel
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Frank and Fiona go to extreme lengths in court to claim sole custody of the kids. While Hymie's family arrives to take their son from Sheila and Jody, Karen returns home.
